results.title: Senior Civil Engineer
results.description: Medium sized multidisciplinary consulting engineer is seeking a Senior Civil Engineer for their Johannesburg office.The ideal candidate for this role with have a BSc in Civil Engineering, Professional Registration with ECSA, and at least 8 years experience in the design of roads and related infrastructure.

results.title: Gcc Engineering Manager

The successful applicant will be in possession of a Mechanical or Electrical Degree, a Government Certificate of Competency (Factories) and 5 - 10 years' experience in a manufacturing environment. A well-established consulting firm is currently looking for an individual to join their team as an Electrical Technologist / Technician.The position will be based in Pretoria. Plant Manager
results.description: Hire Resolve is assisting one of the leading mining companies in their search for a Plant Manager to be based in Gauteng. Candidates are required to be in possession of a Degree in Chemical / Metallurgical Engineering as well as a MDP or similar qualification. Candidates must have a minimum of 10 years experience in a Gold plant mining environment, of which 8 must be at supervisory level. Female candidates will be strongly preferred.

results.title: Senior Millwright
results.description: A massive mining company is urgently looking for a Senior Millwright to be based at their mine in Mpumalanga. Applicants must have at least 10 years relevant operational experience in a mining environment, with extensive experience on earthmoving equipment. Candidates must also be in possession of a N6 Certificate as well as a Millwright Trade Test (Section 13).

Hire Resolve is assisting one of the leading mining companies in their search for an Underground Foreman to be based at their mine in Mpumalanga. Candidates are required to be in possession of a N4 Certificate as well as a Section 13 Trade Test, with a Foreman Certificate serving as an added advantageous. Candidates must have a minimum of 10 years experience in an underground mining environment, with 4 years in a Foreman position.
results.title: Underground Foreman
